description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- September 10th, 2024

description: If you haven’t heard of award winning game designer Jay Dragon, well, you’re missing out. Jay’s games Wanderhome and Yazeba’s Bed & Breakfast have been huge hits in the TTRPG world and it’s definitely worth keeping an eye out for what’s next from Possum Creek Games, where Jay is editorial director.  It’s also worth following […]
title: What’s the Point of Game Designers? with Game Designer Jay Dragon

description: I was excited to get my hands on the first Conquest campaign pack: Crucible of Wills, the Stone Face Campaign. The Warhammer codex system is deeply outdated and awkward as a means of delivering rules, but the one thing it is great at is expositing lore. Buy a codex and you’d be presented with a […]
title: Conquest Campaign Pack Review: Crucible of Wills

description: Our Crusade group get together to talk about how to handle balance in the narrative game mode between factions with Codexes and those without.
title: 40k Roundtable: Balancing Crusade Narrative Campaigns

description: The past weekend saw the third and final UK Goonhammer event for the year, where over 120 gamers congregated for a weekend of tabletop action in the 31st and 41st Millenniums. Thank Yous Before we get to the results, this event would not be possible if it were not for the assistance and support of […]
title: The Goonhammer Open UK September 2024 – Awards and Thank Yous

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? returns this week covering more Kill Team content! This time he goes over the Imperial factions as previewed by Games Workshop! He goes over the changes in-depth and compares them to their old profiles to see how they’ve changed for the new edition of Kill Team! Have any […]
title: CYRAC: Kill Team Imperial Factions Preview
